features: UNIVERSAL COMPATIBLE TV SIZE This TV mount Monitor mount bracket fits for most of 10inch to 26inch TVs and Monitors with VESA size available 50x50,75x75,100x100 and Max weight 22lbs.
MULTIPLE DIRECTION ADJUSTABLE Enjoy your viewing experience with this Monitor bracket providing you ±30° tilt, ±45° swivel angles.

EASY INSTALLATION We developed a 3-step installation process and a manual that is actually useful.Only take you 20 minutes to finish the installation. Surprise everyone by how easily and fast you got the TV monitor going right. Warm tips: In order to avoid customer misusing concrete anchors onto wood studs or drywall directly causing any safety issues, we removed concrete anchors from our package. If you need concrete anchors, please contact us to get it for free which be sent from USA.
UNIVERSAL WALL TYPE COMPATIBILITY Compatible with concrete wall or single wood stud.Do not install this wall mount on dry wall alone.
HEAVY DUTY STRUCTURE Robot welding,consistent quality and industrial design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to hang computer monitors to free up cramped workspace
reviews.reviewText: Loved the price and the instructions included. Also, these arrived quickly. Just in time to get everything set up over the weekend. Due to work from home requirements, my desk was very cluttered. The desk I am using wouldn't allow the usual monitor stand because it is a built-in shelf in an alcove so no place to clamp on. I also use three monitors for work and then two for personal which I also use for work. Instead of playing around trying to find proper studs, we mounted a board to the wall. That way we could place the monitors where needed to save space. This setup works great and allows me to have two keyboards/mice on the desk without issue. I am actually going to order another one. Very sturdy and you can adjust the tilt up/down and side to side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mounting option
reviews.reviewText: These mounts are extremely easy to install. The only downsides are the bottom set screw that holds the device is very tricky to reach in order to tighten. The mount does not allow space if you are using a VGA or DVI connection due to it being so close to the wall. I just purchased a DVI adapter if you will. It allows you to insert the DVI connector to the port of device and the DVI cable to the other end allowing the cable to hang down instead of out towards the wall(Bending the cable against wall behind monitor) Here is the linkDTECH DVI Adapter 90 Degree DVI-I Female to DVI-D Male Right Angle Connector Converter Installed in Little Space 1080P Digital Video for Computer Monitor PC Older Projector TV https://a.co/d/e5P7szA It states the mount only holds up to a 26" device but my monitor is 27" and very light and it fit perfectly. I attached to the wall using anchors and its fine. The directions state not to attach to drywall only but I think if you are hanging a lighter weight device it will be fine. Very easy to mount. Took me 10 minutes to install 2 mounts. Thats with marking - Leveling - Drilling starter holes and mounting. Very easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works as it should. Very stable and strong. Gives enough movement up and down and tilt back and forth to make any adjustments you might have. Came with all the hardware you would need for any TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent budget monitor wall mount
reviews.reviewText: Directions are straight ahead, mounting the bracket to the monitor is easy as was mounting the bracket to the wall. Lining things up joining the 2 gets tricky, there's 2 spacers that must line up with the bolt. If you have a second person holding and maneuvering the monitor it would be easier. Measure twice, mount it once is the saying. Stable and looks good when done

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and adjustable left to right.
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to install, came with everything you need. I advise using better drywall anchors than what is supplied. To install device remove center bolt between wall mount and VESA mount first, mount to wall and device then replace bolt. Pretty straight forward installation, you can tighen screw to prevent swinging left to right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great Once Assembled
reviews.reviewText: Using it for a small monitor/TV and does the job well. Comes with needed hardware but assembling it can be tricky, especially reassembling from the two parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, simple, convenient
reviews.reviewText: Excellent little thing,it works very well and I'm very happy with it.Here's what I think you need to know before you buy this.1-it is tiny, I was genuinely shocked by how small it is for a wall mount.2-it is sturdy,it's made entirely of steel,so it has no bend or flex to it.3-it has tilt and swivel function,but it's not height adjustable so make sure you pick the right spot before you install it.4-its not very easy to install, you will need a drill or a spanner to attach it to the wall.Apart from a little bit of installation pain , I'm quite happy with it ,and I must say my monitor does looks a lot better mounted on my wall than it does sitting on my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent no-frills wall bracket (see details). Highly Recommended
reviews.reviewText: I needed to mount the monitor for the automation server/NVR in the back room of our salon, and wanted to find the least expensive solution possible. The USX MOUNT TV Wall Mount Monitor Mount Bracket (XMS002) is a pretty basic piece of equipment, and it appeared to meet the requirement. I mounted the wall-side of the bracket into a brick wall with two screws. The monitor-side bracket attached to the monitor with included screws and washers. Two sizes of hardware are included, but no spacers are included (should you have a monitor without a flat back housing. The two halves of the mount attach with a single flange, and it's secured with a single screw at the bottom. The whole arrangement is fine, but it does help if you have a long screwdriver. For about $15 (with 10% off coupon, at the time of this review), it's hard to imagine a bracket performing this well for less money. Sure, if you need more features, like rotation or an extension arm, this is not the solution for you. Otherwise, this bracket is great for the price. Highly Recommended
